sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { View, Text, StyleSheet } from 'react-native'
import Background from './main/background/Background'

const WeatherItem = ({ title, value, unit }) => {
    return (<View>
        <Text>{title}</Text>
        <Text>{value}{unit}</Text>
    </View>)
}

const DateTime = () => {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View>
                <View>
                    <Text style={styles.heading} >12:30am</Text>
                </View>
                <View>
                    <Text>Monday, 7, June</Text>
                </View>
                <View>
                    <WeatherItem title='Humidity' value={79} unit='%' />
                    <WeatherItem title='Pressure' value={1000} unit='hPa' />
                    <WeatherItem title='Sunrise' value='06:00' unit='am' />
                    <WeatherItem title='Sunset' value='06:30' unit='pm' />

                </View>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text>Ukraine, Kyiv</Text>
                <Text>4.22 EN 50e</Text>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}

export default DateTime

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        flex: 1.5,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
    },
    heading:{
        fontSize: 45,
        color: 'white'
    }
})
